page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content:
The block surveyed is divided into two by the{tidal estuary}of the{River {Camel,}a{desgnated area of outstanding {natural beauty.}Apart from the market town of{Wadebridge}and the villages of {Whitecross}and{Bodieve}the area is predominantly agricultural.Agriculture and tourism are of vital importance.
{WADEBRIDGE POPULATION (1981)__3952 {EARLY CLOSING WEDNESDAY {MARKET DAY MONDAY { {BODMIN 7 MILES PADSTOW 8 MILES {TRURO 24 MILES PLYMOUTH 38 MILES { {DAILY BUS SERVICES TO PADSTOW BODMIN {POLZEATH CAMELFORD PLYMOUTH & LONDON {
